description: This file defines route handlers for a notes API in an Express.js server. It includes endpoints for listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes, interacting with a database module.

methods.name: GET /api/notes
methods.description: List notes with optional search and sorting parameters.

methods.name: POST /api/notes
methods.description: Create a new note with provided title and optional content.

methods.name: GET /api/notes/:id
methods.description: Retrieve a specific note by its ID.

methods.name: PUT /api/notes/:id
methods.description: Update a specific note by ID with new title and/or content.

methods.name: DELETE /api/notes/:id
methods.description: Remove a note by its ID.
